reason: NO_RULE - insufficient evidence or no valid constraint found
notes: The evidence provided only describes behavior within a single IE and does not establish a cross-reference or dependency between the fields from different IEs.

meta.evidence: - qcl-InfoPeriodicCSI-RS contains a reference to a TCI-State indicating QCL source RS(s) and QCL type(s). If the TCI-State is configured with a reference to an RS configured with qcl-Type set to 'typeD' association, that RS may be an SS/PBCH block located in the same or different CC/DL BWP or a CSI-RS resource configured as periodic located in the same or different CC/DL BWP. The reference RS may additionally be an SS/PBCH block associated with a PCI different from the PCI of the serving cell.

full_api_response.predicate: No inter-IE constraint found between qcl-infoperiodiccsi-rs fields from different IEs.
full_api_response.notes: The evidence provided only describes behavior within a single IE and does not establish a cross-reference or dependency between the fields from different IEs.
